lead_paragraph: International Olympic Committee executive board member and former Olympian Anita DeFrantz was named as a senior advisor for the group trying to bring the 2024 Summer Games to Los Angeles, LA24 said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: IOC Executive Anita DeFrantz Joins LA Olympic Bid
headline.main: IOC Executive Anita DeFrantz Joins LA Olympic Bid
